a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global natural disaster death rates, 1900 to 2022
Death rates from natural disasters are measured as the number of deaths per 100,000 individuals.
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Université catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
